title: The House that Jack built. Never, never say die
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television programs
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television programs - Great Britain
abstract: The House that Jack built (dir. Don Levear, 1965)--Never, never say die (dir. Robert Day, 1967).
description: Episode of Series "The Avengers". These two episodes of television series were orignally aired in the mid to late sixties. "The House that Jack built": Emma finds that she has an Uncle Jack who has left her a house in his will. She soon discovers that this unexpected windfall is not all it seems and a face from her past is out for revenge. In "Never, never say die", the dead are starting to walk, and people are surviving shootings and electric shocks which should kill them. Strange things are happening, and Steed and Emma discover that death might not be forever.
